title: Did someone jump in EC Campus
content: I heard someone jumped in EC campus yesterday, why???

comments.body: What I have heard is it was a third year, I have no idea about the cause.
Yes, but idk if he's in a coma or if he's passed away. I'm still praying there's some positive news. It was apparently his birthday.

Ay bro what
When did this happen?
It's seems he's dead but why did he jump tho exam pressure or something
Idk, he was a pretty calm kid honestly
That's extremely tragic, moreover it being his birthday
Idk wtf is this happening so much and that too a third year this time??
Sadly he passed away last night only
Then why? What is happening in this college?
A third year student I meant to say not third time
Ohhh, crap. Sorry. I was sleepy and misread it.
